properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 7th November 2023** Toastie Toes and Get To Knows! We provide a warm and welcoming space for families and friends to meet up, enjoy a little company and a hot meal, or simply a cuppa! You can come along and do your own thing or sit with others and play boardgames, watch movies, enjoy colouring and puzzle books, settle into a couch with a good book - and many more options, all for nowt, or a donation you can afford. We are planning a few activities - crafting sessions, bingo, games, quiz nights, movie nights and are open to suggestions too! Donâ€™t sit at home, come along and meet your community.
